events: You wake up in the slightly damp grass; you can't remember why you're here but a feeling comes over you: you're a hero.

Your eyes are tired, you smell something stinky next to you, at first you think it's you, then you realise you're standing on a shit cow.
The farmhouse is staring at you with a look that reminds you of your father....she's asking you for help, she says there are monsters prowling around.
comments: random events text lors du spawn du joueur
